title: A Saturday Afternoon with Route 9 Ensemble: Standards and Holiday Highlights
desc: Ensemble's core string quartet will delight music lovers of all ages with an exciting program featuring standard chamber music repertoire and holiday favorites. The quartet will perform *Schubert's Quartet No. 14 in D minor*, also known as *Death and the Maiden*, and Joan Tower's *Night Fields*, as well as selections from Tchaikovsky's *The Nutcracker*, and sentimental arrangements of holiday carols.
